Uses of Interface
io.netty.resolver.dns.DnsQueryLifecycleObserverFactory

  • Packages that use DnsQueryLifecycleObserverFactory 
    Package Description
    io.netty.resolver.dns
    An alternative to Java's built-in domain name lookup mechanism that resolves a domain name asynchronously, which supports the queries of an arbitrary DNS record type as well.

    • Uses of DnsQueryLifecycleObserverFactory in io.netty.resolver.dns

      Classes in io.netty.resolver.dns that implement DnsQueryLifecycleObserverFactory 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  BiDnsQueryLifecycleObserverFactory
      Combines two DnsQueryLifecycleObserverFactory into a single DnsQueryLifecycleObserverFactory.
      class  LoggingDnsQueryLifeCycleObserverFactory
      A DnsQueryLifecycleObserverFactory that enables detailed logging in the DnsNameResolver.
      class  NoopDnsQueryLifecycleObserverFactory  
      Methods in io.netty.resolver.dns with parameters of type DnsQueryLifecycleObserverFactory 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      DnsNameResolverBuilder DnsNameResolverBuilder.dnsQueryLifecycleObserverFactory​(DnsQueryLifecycleObserverFactory lifecycleObserverFactory)
      Set the factory used to generate objects which can observe individual DNS queries.
